title: Pyramid Pooling
body_html:
Summary:
Add pyramid pooling functionality to sparseNN.

To enable pyramid pooling, set
Advanced Options -> Pooling Option -> Pyramid Pooling Option -> N Splits

Current implementation requires the lowest level n splits is divisible the higher level n splits. For example, 6 splits at level 0, 3 splits at level 1, and 1 split at level 0 is allowed because 6 is divisible by 1 and 3. But 5, 3, 1 is not allowed because 5 is not divisible by 3.

Differential Revision: D9628145

body:
Summary:
Add pyramid pooling functionality to sparseNN.

To enable pyramid pooling, set
  Advanced Options -> Pooling Option -> Pyramid Pooling Option -> N Splits

Current implementation requires the lowest level n splits is divisible the higher level n splits. For example, 6 splits at level 0, 3 splits at level 1, and 1 split at level 0 is allowed because 6 is divisible by 1 and 3. But 5, 3, 1 is not allowed because 5 is not divisible by 3.
